meanings.definition: Filled with excessive and single-minded zeal
meanings.sent1: The fanatical supporter cheered loudly for his team throughout the entire game.
meanings.sent2: She had a fanatical love for collecting stamps from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The fanatical gardener talked to her plants every day, hoping they would grow faster.
meanings.sent4: His fanatical dedication to his craft made him stand out among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The fanatical explorer traveled to the ends of the earth in search of rare artifacts.

meanings.sent1: The fanatical movie buff watched every film in the series multiple times.
meanings.sent2: She was a fanatical fan of the band, attending every concert they had.
meanings.sent3: The fanatical baker baked dozens of cookies for the school fundraiser.
meanings.sent4: His fanatical loyalty to his favorite sports team never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The fanatical reader finished the entire book series in just a week.

meanings.sent1: The fanatical environmentalist organized beach cleanups every weekend.
meanings.sent2: She had a fanatical interest in learning about different cultures around the world.
meanings.sent3: The fanatical cat lover had a collection of cat-themed socks.
